description:
It’s a rare sight to see such a powerful gaming laptop get such a steep sale, but the Alienware m16 R2 is on sale for $400 off at Best Buy. Now available for $1,500 instead of $1,900, this deal is a total bargain if you’re in the market for a powerful, versatile device at a solid price.

When we reviewed the Alienware m16 R2, we found it to be an excellent gaming laptop, enough to earn it 4.5 out of 5 stars and our Editors’ Choice award. “The Alienware m16 R2 is a ‘do it all’ 16-inch laptop for ga
title: This RTX-stacked Alienware gaming laptop is $400 off right now

title: Spend $20, Get $20—the BJ’s Club Card Membership Deal You Can’t Miss
